mapper.select: select id, data_name, is_real, add_name, add_time, is_sparse, description, trans_count, item_count, avg_trans_len, max_trans_len, data_url from dataset where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into dataset(data_name, is_real, add_name, add_time, is_sparse, description, trans_count, item_count, avg_trans_len, max_trans_len, data_url) values (#{dataName}, #{isReal}, #{addName}, #{addTime}, #{isSparse}, #{description}, #{transCount}, #{itemCount}, #{avgTransLen}, #{maxTransLen}, #{dataUrl})

insert into dataset(data_name, is_real, add_name, add_time, is_sparse, description, trans_count, item_count, avg_trans_len, max_trans_len, data_url) values
(#{entity.dataName}, #{entity.isReal}, #{entity.addName}, #{entity.addTime}, #{entity.isSparse}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.transCount}, #{entity.itemCount}, #{entity.avgTransLen}, #{entity.maxTransLen}, #{entity.dataUrl})

insert into dataset(data_name, is_real, add_name, add_time, is_sparse, description, trans_count, item_count, avg_trans_len, max_trans_len, data_url) values
(#{entity.dataName}, #{entity.isReal}, #{entity.addName}, #{entity.addTime}, #{entity.isSparse}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.transCount}, #{entity.itemCount}, #{entity.avgTransLen}, #{entity.maxTransLen}, #{entity.dataUrl})
on duplicate key update data_name = values(data_name), is_real = values(is_real), add_name = values(add_name), add_time = values(add_time), is_sparse = values(is_sparse), description = values(description), trans_count = values(trans_count), item_count = values(item_count), avg_trans_len = values(avg_trans_len), max_trans_len = values(max_trans_len), data_url = values(data_url)
mapper.update:
update dataset
data_name = #{dataName},
is_real = #{isReal},
add_name = #{addName},
add_time = #{addTime},
is_sparse = #{isSparse},
description = #{description},
trans_count = #{transCount},
item_count = #{itemCount},
avg_trans_len = #{avgTransLen},
max_trans_len = #{maxTransLen},
data_url = #{dataUrl},
where id = #{id}
